{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
clearscope Vector3 '''PosRelative'''(sector ''sec'') const
== Usage == Gets the Actor's position relative to the specified sector. This is used to account for sector portals and will return where the Actor's position appears to be instead of where it actually is.
=== Parameters === *''sec'' - The sector to check relative to.
=== Return value === Returns the corrected position of the Actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
